App Name: Sugar Smash: Book of Life
App Package Name: air.com.sgn.bookoflife.gp

Brief: Embark on a vibrantly colorful journey with "Sugar Smash: Book of Life," a match-3 puzzle game bursting with the energy and charm inspired by the animated movie, THE BOOK OF LIFE. Navigate through a multitude of whimsical worlds, tackling countless puzzles, and challenge your friends in this deliciously adventurous saga. With a flair of Dia de Los Muertos, you can immerse yourself in an ecosystem of festivities and culture while enjoying voice talents from top Hollywood stars. Ready to satiate your sweet tooth? Download "Sugar Smash: Book of Life" today!
